sentences.sContent: The thought of leaving filled him with dismay .
sentences.sCn: 想到要离开，他心里充满了忧伤。

sentences.sContent: The committee was dismayed by what it had been told.
sentences.sCn: 该委员会被所告知的情况搞得焦虑不安。
